overview:
Mark brings over 13 years of technical leadership, solution development and client service experience in leading the agency. With a hands-on background in Enterprise technology consulting, interactive strategy, online community, and social commerce, he has lead and directed engagements for Fortune 500 clients across multiple industries and verticals.

Recognized in 2011 as one of Austin’s 30 New Philanthropists, Mark has a passion for servant leadership, innovation and creating partnerships that are genuine and transparent, pursuing the heart of the business objective.

Mark holds a B.S. in Business Computer Information Systems from the University of North Texas with a focus on Business Management and Leadership.
